wikipedia_page.main: Ivan Bussens (3 June 1960 – 27 August 2007) was a British sportsman who competed at water polo at the Gay Games. He raised the profile of LGBT sport, having co-founded the Out for Sport organisation representing gay clubs in London and served on international sporting associations.

link_mentions.page: List of gay, lesbian or bisexual people: Bi–Bz
response: | GIvan Bussens obituary, The Times. Retrieved 25 December 2007.
One of the founding members of Out For Sport was Ivan Bussens, a member of the Out To Swim aquatics club.
